title: POLICY REVOCATION Capsule
description: Explicit withdrawal of a previously asserted policy, with declared authority and rationale.

created_at.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of the policy revocation.

hash.description: Deterministic hash of the canonicalized capsule. Computed externally.

revoked_policy_id.description: capsule_id of the POLICY ASSERTION being revoked.

revoked_by.description: Entity revoking the policy (e.g. user, system, administrator, import, companion).

authority_basis.description: Capsule ID of a CONSENT ASSERTION delegating authority to revoke this policy. Required when revoked_by is 'companion'.

rationale.description: Explanation for why the policy is being revoked.

notes.description: Optional clarifying notes regarding the revocation.

authority_basis.description: Capsule ID of a CONSENT ASSERTION that delegates authority to revoke policies.
